alert.note: Alert for Geauga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 31 at 2:07PM EDT until November 01 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Geauga county. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 10 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A cold front will move east across the area this evening, with lake effect precipitation developing overnight. Precipitation may briefly begin as a rain/snow mix before quickly becoming all snow. Snowfall rates may exceed 1 inch per hour at times overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
